source_sentence: 如人證得須陀洹果，聞此法門亦復如是；
translation: Just as a person realizes the state of stream-winner and hears this doctrine, so also does he hear it.

source_sentence: 如人證得斯陀含果，聞此法門亦復如是；
translation: Good man, it is just as when someone realizes the state of once-returner and hears this doctrine.

source_sentence: 如人證得阿那含果，聞此法門亦復如是；
translation: Just as a person realizes the state of non-returner and hears this doctrine, so do they also hear it.

source_sentence: 如人證得阿羅漢法，聞此法門亦復如是；
translation: Good man, it is just as when someone realizes the dharma of arhatship and hears this doctrine.

source_sentence: 聞此法門心生信解如坐菩提，聞此法門亦復如是。」
translation: Hearing this teaching gives rise to faith and understanding like sitting in enlightenment, and hearing this teaching is likewise.

source_sentence: 文殊師利童子白言：「如是，世尊！
translation: Mañjuśrī said, So it is, Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 如空如平等、如無相如平等、如無願如平等、如真如如平等、如法界如平等、如實際如平等、如平等如平等、如解脫如平等、如遠離如平等。」
translation: Just as emptiness is equal, just as signlessness is equal, just as wishlessness is equal, just as truth is equal, just as the Dharma realm is equal, just as reality is equal, just as equality is equal, just as liberation is equal, and just as separation is equal.

source_sentence: 爾時，文殊師利童子白佛言：「世尊！
translation: It was then that Mañjuśrī said to the Buddha, Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 唯願世尊護此法門，後世末世五十年時於閻浮提廣行流布，令善男子、善女人咸得聞之。」
translation: May the Bhagavān protect this teaching so that it will be widely disseminated in Jambudvīpa for fifty years in the latter part of the world, so that good men and good women will all hear it.

source_sentence: 爾時，三千大千世界一切天人鼓樂出聲；
translation: At that time, all the celestial and human beings in the great manifold cosmos of the 3,000 great one-thousand worlds sounded.

source_sentence: 一切華樹皆悉敷榮，出種種華；
translation: All the flowering trees grew luxuriant and produced various flowers.

source_sentence: 於此三千大千世界皆悉震動，放大光明遍滿世界，蔽日月光令皆不現。
translation: In these 3,000 great one-thousand worlds, all shaken, he emanates a great ray of light that fills the worlds and obscures the light of the sun and moon so that they don't appear.

source_sentence: 六十四億百千諸天歡喜踊躍，生希有心，住虛空中雨天華香、末香、塗香，
translation: Sixty-four hundred million myriads of koṭis of celestial beings rejoiced and jumped for joy. They thought to themselves, “How rare it is that the fragrance of heavenly flowers, powdered odors, and ointments should rain down in the sky!”

source_sentence: 如雨而下，鼓天伎樂，一切合掌，同聲唱言：「善說如是最勝妙法、奇妙勝法。
translation: They all joined their palms and called out in unison, saying, “Explain thus the most sublime and marvelous teaching!

source_sentence: 今者，文殊師利童子說此法門我等得聞，於此世界得生人中便為再見轉於法輪。
translation: Now, when Mañjuśrī the boy teaches this teaching, we'll hear it, and we'll be born among humans in this world and then turn the wheel of the Dharma again.

source_sentence: 若有眾生聞此法門，有能信解、不驚怖畏，當知是人必定不從小功德來。
translation: If there are any sentient beings who hear this teaching and are able to believe and understand it without fear, you should know that they will surely come from no little merit.

source_sentence: 若有眾生已曾供養過去諸佛，乃得聞此甚深法門不驚怖畏。」
translation: If there are sentient beings who have previously made offerings to the buddhas of the past, they'll be able to hear this profound teaching without fear.

source_sentence: 爾時，文殊師利童子白佛言：「世尊！
translation: It was then that Mañjuśrī said to the Buddha, Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 今有相現，此經法門住持不滅，能於後世五十年時於閻浮提廣行流布。」
translation: Now, there are signs that this sūtra's teaching of the Dharma is abiding and not ceasing, and it will be widely disseminated in Jambudvīpa for fifty years in the future.
The Buddha said, So it is, so it is.
Mañjuśrī!

source_sentence: 今有相現，此經法門住持不滅。」
translation: Now, there's a mark that shows that the Dharma aspect of this sūtra abides and doesn't cease.
Mañjuśrī said, So it is, Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 實作住持，令此法門久住於世。」
translation: They really make this dharma-gate abide and cause it to remain in the world for a long time.
The Buddha said, Mañjuśrī!

source_sentence: 若三解脫門得證涅槃是實實語，此經法門後世末世五十年時於閻浮提廣行流布是實實語。」
translation: If the three gates of liberation attain nirvāṇa are true and real words, this sūtra's teaching is true and real words that will be widely disseminated in Jambudvīpa for fifty years after the end of his life.

source_sentence: 文殊師利言：「若世尊說非我、非眾生、非命、非丈夫、非人、摩那婆、非染、非淨是實實語，
translation: Mañjuśrī replied, “If the World-honored One teaches that what is not self, what is not living beings, what is not life, what is not man, what is not human, what is not manas, what is not defiled, and what is not pure are true words.

source_sentence: 此經法門後世末世五十年時於閻浮提廣行流布是實實語。
translation: At the end of the fifty years after this sūtra's teaching, this is true and real speech that spreads widely in Jambudvīpa for fifty years.

source_sentence: 「若世尊說非貪、瞋、癡，非名、非色，非因、非見，非有、非有識，
translation: “If the Bhagavān explains that it’s not craving, anger, or delusion, neither name nor form, neither cause nor view, and neither existent nor nonexistent consciousness,

source_sentence: 非身、非身記，非心、非心記，非憶、非憶念，非處、非處行，非色、非受、非想、非行、非識，
translation: neither bodily nor bodily memory, neither mind nor mindfulness, neither recollection nor non-recollection, neither place nor non-place formations, neither form nor feeling, neither perception nor perception, neither volition nor consciousness.

source_sentence: 非眼、非色，非耳、非聲，非鼻、非香，非舌、非味，非身、非觸，非意、非法，
translation: What’s not eye, what’s not form, what’s not ear, what’s not sound, what’s not nose, what’s not odor, what’s not taste, what’s not tongue, what’s not taste, what’s not body, what’s not touch, what’s not mind, and what’s not unlawful.

source_sentence: 非欲界、非色界、非無色界，非斷、非常是實實語，此經法門後世末世五十年時於閻浮提廣行流布是實實語。
translation: What's not in the desire realm, what's not in the form realm, and what's not in the formless realm, what's not cut off, and what's not impermanent is true and real speech, and this sūtra teaching of the Dharma will be widely disseminated in Jambudvīpa for fifty years after the end of time.

source_sentence: 「若世尊說非須陀洹、非須陀洹果，非斯陀含、非斯陀含果，非阿那含、非阿那含果，
translation: “World-honored One, if the World-honored One were to teach that it is neither a fruit of stream entry nor a fruit of stream entry, that it is neither a once-returner’s nor a once-returner’s fruit, and that it is neither an ānagamin’s nor an ānagamin’s fruit,

source_sentence: 非阿羅漢、非阿羅漢法，非辟支佛、非辟支佛法，非如來、非如來法，
translation: It is neither the teaching of arhatship nor the teaching of arhatship; it is not the teaching of a pratyekabuddha or a non- pratyekabuddha; it is not the teaching of a Tathāgata or a teaching of a Tathāgata.

source_sentence: 非力、非無畏，非想、非識，非空、非無相、非無願，非無欲、非本性，
translation: It’s not power, not fearlessness, not perception, not consciousness, not emptiness, not signless, not wishless, not dispassionate, and not the original nature.

source_sentence: 非得、非證，非集、非明、非解脫，非彼岸、非中間、非此岸，非涅槃、非名、非無記是實實語，
translation: What’s not attained, what’s not realized, what’s not accumulated, what’s not insight, what’s not liberation, what’s not the other shore, what’s not intermediate, what’s not this shore, what’s not nirvāṇa, what’s not name, and what’s not indeterminate are true words.

source_sentence: 此經法門後世末世五十年時於閻浮提廣行流布是實實語。
translation: At the end of the fifty years after this sūtra's teaching, this is true and real speech that spreads widely in Jambudvīpa for fifty years.

source_sentence: 「若世尊說實無有人相應、不相應，不合、不散是實實語，此經法門後世末世五十年時於閻浮提廣行流布是實實語。
translation: “If the Bhagavān says that there really is no person associated or not associated, and that what doesn’t fit together and doesn’t disperse is true and real speech, then this sūtra's teaching of the Dharma will be widely disseminated in Jambudvīpa for fifty years after the end of time as true and real speech.
“So it is, Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 若前如來、應、正遍知過去已說，無有少法眾生得脫——無得涅槃、非有眾生，
translation: If the Tathāgata, Arhat, Perfectly Enlightened One has already explained in the past that there are no few sentient beings who attain liberation - there are no nirvāṇa and no sentient beings who attain it.

source_sentence: 非有法生、非有法滅，非失、非動——如過去說，如是未來、如是現在皆如是說是實實語；
translation: What is neither arising nor ceasing, what is neither loss nor movement - as has been said in the past, as will be said in the future, and as will be said in the present - all are spoken of in this way. This is true speech.

source_sentence: 此經法門後世末世五十年時於閻浮提廣行流布是實實語。
translation: At the end of the fifty years after this sūtra's teaching, this is true and real speech that spreads widely in Jambudvīpa for fifty years.
“So it is, Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 若說此法無少法說、非語、非說、非言語說，非畢竟說、非後時說、非現前說，
translation: If one teaches this doctrine, there is no little doctrine that is taught, not by words, not by means of words, not by means of words, not by means of words; it is not taught after all, not at a later time, and not in the present.

source_sentence: 非響聲說、非數數說非此法說、無一字說非此法說，無人現在聽、無人未來聽、無人得解脫是實實語，
translation: It is not spoken in an echo, not repeatedly spoken, not according to the teaching of this doctrine; it is not said in a single syllable, not according to the teaching of this doctrine. No one hears it now, no one will hear it in the future, and no one will attain liberation.

source_sentence: 此經法門後世末世五十年時於閻浮提廣行流布是實實語。
translation: At the end of the fifty years after this sūtra's teaching, this is true and real speech that spreads widely in Jambudvīpa for fifty years.

source_sentence: 「若世尊說此戒非戒、非戒果，非三昧、非三昧處，非般若、非般若根智，
translation: “Suppose the Bhagavān explains that these precepts are neither precepts nor fruits of precepts, not samādhi or non-samādhi places, not prajñā or non-prajñā root cognition,

source_sentence: 非解脫、非解脫智是實實語，此經法門後世末世五十年時於閻浮提廣行流布是實實語。
translation: The cognition of what's not liberation and what's not liberation are true words, and this sūtra is true and real words that are widely disseminated in Jambudvīpa for fifty years after the end of the Dharma teaching.

source_sentence: 「若世尊說菩薩法中非布施捨、非戒守護、非忍修集、非精進發、非禪決定、非般若行，
translation: “If the Bhagavān teaches that among the bodhisattva’s teachings there is neither generosity nor relinquishment, morality and discipline, patience and accumulation, effortlessness, concentration and certainty, or practice of prajñā,

source_sentence: 非求菩提、非實行轉，非得菩提、非得力、非得無畏、非根、非正、非轉法輪，
translation: They don’t seek enlightenment, don’t really practice it, don’t attain enlightenment, don’t attain power, don’t attain fearlessness, don’t have faculties, don’t correctly practice it, and don’t turn the wheel of the Dharma.

source_sentence: 非解眾生、非言語說是實實語，此經法門後世末世五十年時於閻浮提廣行流布是實實語。」
translation: If someone doesn't understand sentient beings and doesn't speak words that are true and real words, this sūtra and Dharma teaching will be widely disseminated in Jambudvīpa for fifty years after the end of their lives as true and real words.

source_sentence: 說此法時，於此三千大千世界六種震動。
translation: When he taught this teaching, these 3,000 great one-thousand worlds shook in six ways.

source_sentence: 爾時，彌勒菩薩摩訶薩白佛言：「世尊！
translation: It was then that Maitreya said to the Buddha, Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 以何因緣於此世界如是大動？」
translation: What are the causes and conditions for such a great movement in this world?

source_sentence: 世尊即告彌勒菩薩摩訶薩言：「彌勒！
translation: The Bhagavān then addressed Maitreya Bodhisattva Mahāsattva, saying, Maitreya!

source_sentence: 汝今莫作是語，少信眾生聞不能解則生怖畏。」
translation: Don't say such a thing now; few believe that when sentient beings hear it and can't understand it, they become frightened.

source_sentence: 彌勒菩薩摩訶薩白佛言：「世尊！
translation: Maitreya the Bodhisattva Mahāsattva said to the Buddha, Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 如來若說，多人得力、多所利益安樂天人。」
translation: If the Tathāgata teaches this, many people will attain power and much benefit for the comfort of gods and humans.
The Buddha said, Maitreya!

source_sentence: 過去已有七十四億那由他百千諸佛於此地處說此法門，文殊師利童子菩薩與善住意天子相隨問答論義。」
translation: In the past, there were seventy-four billion nayutas and hundreds of thousands of buddhas here in this place who taught this teaching, and Mañjuśrī Boy Bodhisattva and Sunakṣatra answered each other's questions and discussed its meaning.

source_sentence: 彌勒菩薩摩訶薩白佛言：「世尊！
translation: Maitreya the Bodhisattva Mahāsattva said to the Buddha, Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 文殊師利童子菩薩與善住意天子相隨聞此法門其已久如，於何佛所聞此法門？」
translation: Mañjuśrī, the boy bodhisattva and the well-abiding celestial deity Sunakṣatra followed each other to hear this teaching for a long time; where did the Buddha hear it?
The Buddha said, Maitreya!

source_sentence: 過去久遠七阿僧祇百千劫際，有佛出世號曰普華師子遊步勝功德集如來、應、正遍知。
translation: In the distant past, at the end of seven incalculable hundreds of thousands of eons, a buddha named Samantabhadra lion (i.e., Universal Flower Lion) appeared in the world and walked on foot to gather the superior qualities of the Tathāgata, Arhat, Perfectly Enlightened One.
So it is, good man!
They'll hear this teaching from those buddhas.

source_sentence: 說此法時，恒河沙等眾生發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心，彼二倍人得不退忍，
translation: When they expound this teaching, sentient beings as numerous as the grains of sand in the Ganges River aroused the determination for unexcelled, complete perfect enlightenment.
Twofold, that person will attain the Dharma eye free of defilement.

source_sentence: 世尊既說此法門已，時諸比丘、文殊師利童子菩薩、善住意天子，并諸天、人、阿修羅、乾闥婆等，
translation: After the Bhagavān had explained this teaching, the monks, Mañjuśrī, the boy bodhisattva, the well-abiding celestial spirit, and the gods, humans, asuras, gandharvas, and so forth.
They all heard what the Buddha taught and were greatly delighted.

source_sentence: 聖善住意天子所問經卷下
translation: Second Fascicle of the Sutra on the Questions Asked by the Sacred Good-abiding Celestial Son, Volume II
